Package api

Class HotelResource

java.lang.Object
api.HotelResource
public class HotelResource
extends java.lang.Object
The HotelResource have little to no behavior contained inside the class. And makes use of the Service classes to implement its methods.

  • Method Summary

      Gets Instance of HotelSource object
      Returns:
      instance of HotelSource

    • getCustomer

      public Customer getCustomer​(java.lang.String email)
      Gets Customer with mail address. If Customer doesn't exist it'll return null.
      Parameters:
      email - key for customer.
      Returns:
      Customer or null.

    • createACustomer

      public void createACustomer​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName)
      Creates new customer
      Parameters:
      email - email address name@domain.com format.
      firstName - name of the customer. Ex. Kaan.
      lastName - last name of the customer. Ex. Kahraman.

    • getARoom

      public Room getARoom​(int roomNumber)
      Gets a room with room number. If room doesn't exist it'll return null
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - as key
      Returns:
      Room or null.

    • bookARoom

      public Reservation bookARoom​(java.lang.String customerEmail, Room room, java.util.Date checkInDate, java.util.Date checkOutDate)
      As Customer, books a room with given date and room. In other words creates a reservation.
      Parameters:
      customerEmail - Customers mail address name@domain.com format
      room - Room to be booked
      checkInDate - date in format of "dd/MM/yyyy".
      checkOutDate - date in format of "dd/MM/yyyy".
      Returns:
      new Reservation or null.

    • getCustomersReservation

      public java.util.Collection<Reservation> getCustomersReservation​(java.lang.String customerEmail)
      Returns a list of customers reservations. If list is empty will return null.
      Parameters:
      customerEmail - to check reservations
      Returns:
      list of reservations or null.

    • findARoom

      public java.util.Collection<Room> findARoom​(java.util.Date checkIn, java.util.Date checkOut)
      Finds a room between given dates. If none find will return null.
      Parameters:
      checkIn - date in format of "dd/MM/yyyy".
      checkOut - date in format of "dd/MM/yyyy".
      Returns:
      Room or null.
